meanings.definition: A feeling of triumphant elation or jubilation.
meanings.sent1: Her exultance was evident as she jumped up and down in excitement.
meanings.sent2: The exultance on his face showed how happy he was with his achievement.
meanings.sent3: The exultance in the room was contagious, spreading joy to everyone present.
meanings.sent4: The exultance in her heart was like a burst of colorful fireworks on a dark night.
meanings.sent5: The exultance of winning the race made her feel like she could conquer the world.

meanings.definition: The state of being extremely joyful or ecstatic.
meanings.sent1: Their exultance was so infectious that it lifted the spirits of everyone around.
meanings.sent2: The exultance in the air was palpable, filling the room with happiness.
meanings.sent3: His exultance knew no bounds as he danced around the room in pure joy.
meanings.sent4: The exultance of the children playing in the park was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The exultance of the crowd at the concert created a magical atmosphere.
